attributes.action: Albania and Albanians are owed and appologie.
attributes.additional_details:
We Albanians find this very offensive, racist and provocative. 
At same time as promoting hatred and going against all fundamentals and principals this country stands for. 
It is a lot more hurtful and offensive when it comes from the people that are considered to be the pilar of society.
attributes.background:
An advert was produced which the Remainers have pushed out with glee on social media.
With Albanian flag and the sneering slogan declaring: “The Leave Campaign want us to quit the single market and be like Albania. Seriously.”

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. This advert is the responsibility of the Remain campaign, not the UK Government or Parliament.  The UK Government and Parliament as a whole do not have the power to make any of the referendum campaigns apologise for any of their actions.
